Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a joint report by the department of audit and control and the authorities budget office
Summary: Relates to a joint report by the department of audit and control and the authorities budget office on the financial and operational practices of any state authority whose purpose is to operate commuter transportation within the metropolitan commuter transportation district.
LawCode: Add ยง9, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to an annual joint report on the financial and operational practices of any state authority whose purpose is to operate commuter transportation within the metropolitan commuter transportation district
